plot outline: Tiger Gangu is a 1990 Indian Kannada film, directed by K Sundarnatha Suvarna and produced by M S Kemparaj and M Ramalingam. The film stars Tiger Prabhakar, Pavithra, Leelavathi, Mamatha Rao, Vajramuni, Sudarshan, Jai Jagadish and Sudheer in lead roles. The film had musical score Shankar-Ganesh. Watch the full movie Tiger Gangu online, only on Eros Now.
